entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then snow. Blowing snow at times before morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 late this evening. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow. Risk of freezing drizzle late in the afternoon. Blowing snow at times in the morning and early in the afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of freezing drizzle. Temperature steady near minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of freezing drizzle. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Saturday 8 April 2023
